/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the scene.
